title: Large-Scale AI Development
description: Open-source suite of medical LLMs that has become a pioneering work in large-scale medical foundation models. MEDITRON-70B demonstrates state-of-the-art performance on medical reasoning tasks.

title: Reasoning as Test-Time Learning
description: We research on a new paradigm of reasoning as test-time learning where models continue to learn from new information at inference time. Topics include dynamic knowledge integration, long-context reasoning, episodic memory, RL post-training, and Deep Research agents.
